text: Sphingomonas sanxanigenens is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming and rod- shaped bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from soil from a cornfield from Xinhe County in China.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas sanxanigenens at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase sanxanigenens Category:Bacteria described in 2009
title: Sphingomonas sanxanigenens
